user_query: I want to find food items that align with my sister's specific diet plan, categorized by their core ingredients, along with their types and nutritional values.

TaskList.description: Gather dietary restrictions or requirements from user regarding the specific diet plan.
Query a database for food items that match the dietary restrictions provided in step 1 and categorize them by their core ingredients.
Retrieve nutritional values for each food item obtained in step 2.
Compile a comprehensive list of food items along with their types and nutritional values categorized by core ingredients.
